title: Transferring Server
body: I transferred to EUW from EUNE. I have been waiting inlike 2 hours now for it to transfer. It clearly doesn't, and i feel like i've spend my money on nothing. Just wasted. You save five minutes. Maybe 5 hours? I kinda mad cause it. And i want my money back, if i cant change server... BIG WASTE OF MONEY!!!*

replies.body: Are you still having issues transferring or did your transfer go through properly by now? If you're still experiencing issues, reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll have one of our specialists reach back out so this can get resolved for good. ^.^
